input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product features and product title below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product title:
Acoustic Research PR190N Component Video 3 pc Red/Blue/Green w/males ends (3 feet) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)

Product features:
24K gold plating
Precision machined 8 segment connectors
Nitrogen injected dielectric
Multi-shielded design
Pure silver coated oxygen-free copper
input_text.Response A: This Acoustic Research (AR) video component cable is of higher quality than most standard audio/video cables giving you a cleaner, clearer picture and sound. The three-piece set of red, blue, and green cables are each 1.5 meters (4.9 feet) long.  The multi-shielded design, nitrogen injected dielectric, and pure silver coated oxygen-free copper all work together to provide an improved signal transmission.  The 24K gold plating on the precision machined 8 segment connectors ensures long-lasting, corrosion-free connections.  The male end of the cables are standard RCA connectors.
input_text.Response B: Wow, this sounds like an amazing cable for connecting audio and video components!  Some of the key features include 24K gold plating for superior conductivity, precision machined 8 segment connectors for a secure connection, and nitrogen injected dielectric and multi-shielding for enhanced signal clarity and noise rejection.  These cables are also made with pure silver coated oxygen-free copper wiring for enhanced signal transmission.  Overall this sounds like a high quality, high performance cable that will deliver exceptional audio and video performance!

label_annotations.feedback: Felt response A was sounded much more like a product description, marked it down as the length of the cable was wrong from the description. response B sounds like a reviewer wanting to buy it
